title: ISic000008. Epitaph for Vibia Pothine
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) M(anibus)
Vibiae Pothine
Vibia Euphro-
syne ( vac. 1) fil(ia)
5matri ( vac. 1) pient(issimae)
et Theophanes
coniugi
merenti

Apparatus criticus

Text from photograph; Bivona: Vibia Erothine

English translation

To the shades of the departed, to Vibia Pothine. Vibia Euphrosyne, daughter, for her most dutiful mother and Theophanes for his deserving wife.

commentary

Raepsaet-Charlier corrected the erroneous reading of Bivona of line 2.

  • Bernabò Brea and Cavalier 1991 101 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002158
